text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Trainer, have you had a look at the bulletin board yet? There's a lot of information on it!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Sure, social media is convenient, but there's something comforting and wonderful about posters.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: And isn't it nice? You know… having people standing beside you, looking at the same thing?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I like that. It feels similar to… when I'm heading toward the same goal with you!
